subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|囗|木|ls=ic|t1=surround|t2=wood}}. Probably the original form of {{och-l|梱|doorsill}} and {{och-l|閫|doorsill}}.

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[surround]]; to [[besiege]]
# to be [[surround]]ed
# [[difficult]]
# 47th [[hexagram]] of the [[I Ching]]
